abstract: Judge Jed S Rakoff of Federal District Court in Manhattan grants request from Richard Lipsky, disgraced lobbyist turned criminal justice advocate, to allow him to consult for United Food and Commercial Workers International Union on issues faced by former prisoners seeking employment; Lipsky, who was convicted on bribery charges, had previously been barred by New York law from advising unions until 13 years after his release.

keywords.value: United Food and Commercial Workers Union
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: Richard Lipsky, a New York lobbyist felled in a bribery scandal, won a judge’s permission to consult for a union on barriers to jobs for former inmates.
